title: Motichoor Chaknachoor
short_cast: Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Athiya Shetty, Sanjeev Vats, Vibha Chhibber, Vivek Mishra, Navni Parihar, Karuna Pandey, Abhishek Rawat
cast: Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Athiya Shetty, Sanjeev Vats, Vibha Chhibber, Vivek Mishra, Navni Parihar, Karuna Pandey, Abhishek Rawat
genre: Romantic Comedies, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Comedies, Dramas, Romantic Movies

desc: Pushing 40 and unemployed, a Dubai returnee desperate for a wife catches the eye of a Bhopal belle, who sees him solely as her ticket out of India.
